criteria: Understanding of the derivative as the slope of the tangent line.
Ability to calculate the derivative at a specific point and relate it to the tangent line.
Application of derivatives in real-world scenarios.
descriptions: Student demonstrates no understanding of derivatives or tangent lines.
Student shows minimal understanding, unable to connect derivatives to tangent lines.
Student can identify derivatives and tangent lines but struggles to explain the relationship.
Student understands that the derivative is related to the tangent line's slope but has some inaccuracies in their explanation.
Student accurately explains the relationship between the derivative and the slope of the tangent line with minor errors.
Student clearly and accurately explains the relationship between the derivative and the slope of the tangent line, demonstrating a strong understanding.
Student is unable to calculate derivatives or find the slope of a tangent line.
Student attempts to calculate derivatives but makes significant errors, unable to find tangent line slopes.
Student can calculate simple derivatives but struggles with more complex functions, showing limited ability to find tangent line slopes.
Student can calculate derivatives for many functions and finds tangent line slopes with occasional errors.
Student consistently calculates derivatives correctly and accurately finds tangent line slopes.
Student demonstrates mastery in calculating derivatives and finding tangent line slopes, including for complex functions.
Student cannot apply derivatives to solve problems in real-world scenarios.
Student attempts to apply derivatives but is unsuccessful in solving real-world problems.
Student can identify some real-world applications of derivatives but struggles to solve them effectively.
Student applies derivatives to solve some real-world problems but needs guidance.
Student applies derivatives to effectively solve real-world problems with minimal errors.
Student expertly applies derivatives to solve complex real-world problems, demonstrating a deep understanding.
